title: Tether leads as crypto borrowing soars to $44 billion in record quarter

body.raw:
![Tether leads as crypto borrowing soars to $44 billion in record quarter](https://cryptoslate.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/tether-loan.jpg)

Crypto borrowing surged in Q2 2025, hitting a record $26.47 billion backed by digital assets on DeFi platforms. Galaxy Research revealed a 42.1% increase from the previous quarter. This trend highlights the growing popularity of leveraging crypto holdings for loans in the market.
